title: unavailable
body:
Good evening before 15 minutes played a ranked game and suddenly flies out.I try to close client and i do recconect but nothing....
Now i try to open the game and it is unavailable.. I lose points for my ranked or no?

replies.body:
Can you give me a bit more detailed description of what happened? It sounds like the client crashed, but I need more details.

As for losing LP, if you disconnected from a match and were unable to join, it's possible you did lose LP.
TARGO BLADE, its possible the server collapse by fix a lot of bugs in the game?
